name: Bible Game - Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
For masters and beginners of jigsaw puzzle games, for Christian story lovers, let's together play this game!
This Biblical jigsaw puzzle is a great way to relax and enjoy Bible stories. Here you will find jigsaw puzzles with:
· Jesus Christ
· History
· Animals
· Verse
· Christian Festivals
· Churches
· Chapels
· Cathedrals
· Holy Bible
· Candles
· Crosses
Besides all the fun part of the game, there are various benefits for your health: mental and physical.
Help yourself relax, unwind, and get rid of stress and anxiety. Train your brain and let your eyes enjoy great quality pictures.
You can be closer to God anytime and anywhere. This Bible jigsaw will help you calm down, and find peace wherever and whenever you play these jigsaw puzzles.
Christian Jigsaw features:
· There are different categories with a huge variety of pictures.
· All pictures are of HD quality. Complete your jigsaw puzzle Holy Image and send it to your parents, relatives, and friends.
· Feel free to choose the difficulty level suitable for you. 36 – 900 puzzle pieces that you should put together.
· Constantly updating jigsaw puzzle collections of 2000+ pictures!
· Save, share and enjoy the images.
· A very friendly and assisting user interface;
· No time limits. Play anytime and offline. Once the pictures are downloaded, no internet connection is needed!
